page.title: 07The Rector of Hambleden.
page.content: Our Rector is responsible for a certain area.This area has five parishes.The schools in his area are Hambleden, Frieth and Danesfield.Our school is a church school so it is run with the help of the church.The rector spends a lot of time getting people ready for their marriage.They meet and talk with him five times before they are actually wed.He also comes to teach us about God.His job is to tell everyone that whatever happens the Lord still loves them.He comforts the family of someone who has just died.Every day is a long and heavy day for him.The lightest day of the week is Sunday.If someone is dying Mr.Joyce must drop whatever he is doing and call on them.He has two retired priests and a full time priest to help him.
